description: Prime recurrence: a(n+1) = a(n)-th prime, with a(1) = 4.
comments: _Lubomir Alexandrov_ informs me that he studied this sequence in his 1965 notebook. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 23 2008.
links: Lubomir Alexandrov, Prime Number Sequences And Matrices Generated By Counting Arithmetic Functions, Communications of the Joint Institute of Nuclear Research, E5-2002-55, Dubna, 2002.
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 26 2000
